name: The Great Gatsby
title: A timeless classic exploring the American Dream, love, and the Jazz Age.

name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
title: A thought-provoking exploration of the history of Homo sapiens, from the emergence of our species to the present day.

name: Good Omens
title: A hilarious and irreverent take on the apocalypse, filled with wit and satire.

name: Cosmos
title: An awe-inspiring journey through space and time, exploring the wonders of the universe and our place within it.

name: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
title: The first book in the beloved series about a young wizard's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
title: A powerful and timeless novel that addresses racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

name: Interpreter of Maladies
title: A collection of beautifully written short stories that explore the immigrant experience, family dynamics, and cultural identity.

name: The Power of Habit: Why We Do What We Do in Life and Business
title: A compelling exploration of the science behind habit formation and how understanding habits can transform our lives.

name: The Lean Startup: How Today's Entrepreneurs Use Continuous Innovation to Create Radically Successful Businesses
title: A groundbreaking book that offers valuable insights into building and scaling startups by applying lean principles.

name: Eat, Pray, Love
title: A memoir about one woman's journey of self-discovery through travel, food, and spiritual exploration.

name: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
title: A gripping and intricately plotted thriller featuring journalist Mikael Blomkvist and hacker Lisbeth Salander as they unravel a decades-old mystery.

name: The Audacity of Hope: Thoughts on Reclaiming the American Dream
title: A compelling exploration of politics, race, and democracy by the former President of the United States, offering hope and optimism for the future.
